palmos
Class CharPtrArray

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--palmos.CharPtrArray
public final class CharPtrArray
extends java.lang.Object

This class converts from Java-style String[] arrays to C-style char*[] vectors as used by LstSetListChoices.

Usage: 

 static CharPtrArray charPtrs;
 ...
 if (charPtrs == null) {
     choices = new String[3];
     choices[0] = "Fish";
     choices[1] = "Halibut";
     choices[2] = "Marlin";

     charPtrs = new CharPtrArray(choices);

     Palm.LstSetListChoices(fldMyList, charPtrs, charPtrs.size());
 }

CAVEAT: The garbage collector can't see whether an instance of this class is still in use by PalmOS, so you have to keep a reference to the instance in a Java variable as long as the choices are relevant for PalmOS (see field 'charPtrs' above).
